Key Match Events: Towns recorded a double-double with 27 points and 13 rebounds.
Josh Hart had 21 points, 11 rebounds, and 7 assists.
RJ Barrett finished with 16 points for the Raptors.
The Raptors pulled within 50-48 on a floater by Barrett with 1:15 left in the second quarter.
The Knicks scored 15 unanswered points in the fourth quarter.
